WELCOME.SECOND_WELCOME: Amazing beauty experience that's tailored to you!

STORY.MESSAGE_2: My name is Monika and I help people enhance their natural beauty and feel beautiful in their own skin every day.
STORY.MESSAGE_3: For as long as I can remember I have been interested in makeup and have enjoyed taking care of my appearance. Creating the perfect eyeliner or the perfected shape of my eyebrows has always given me a lot of satisfaction. Applying make-up in the morning is still one of my favorite things to do every day. It's also a part of me that I wanted to share with others.
STORY.MESSAGE_4: You know that feeling when you discover a really good piece of music and want to show everyone how great it is? I had that with Microblading and that's why I created Montana PhiBrows.
STORY.MESSAGE_5: Yes, I'm a small, growing, self-sufficient business with no secretary, manager or personal assistant. But I have been trusted by many clients and have managed to find the perfect eyebrow shape for each of them.
STORY.MESSAGE_6: Your visit to my website is the first step towards improving your self-confidence and I am glad that you want to do it together with me. A few hours in my office will allow you to save you time each day, but most importantly will give you an immediate, delightful result.

SERVICES.SMALL_HEADER: Pernament make-up and anti aging treatments
SERVICES.MICROBLADING: PhiBrows Microblading is a cosmetic procedure that inserts pigment under your skin dedicated manual tool to give you well-defined, natural looking eyebrows. Generally, results can last from 18 to 30 months depending on your skin type, lifestyle, and how often you get touch-ups.
SERVICES.MICRONEEDLING: The Plasma Pen is a groundbreaking non-surgical, non-invasive skin treatment. Plasma Pen sessions (also called “fibroblast” therapy) reduce the appearance of wrinkles and rejuvenate dull and sagging skin by stimulating collagen production.
SERVICES.PLASMA_PEN: Microneedling is a cosmetic that uses tiny needles to puncture the skin. It is used to treat a variety of skin conditions that cause depressions in the skin such as acne scarring, surgical scars, other scars, burns, enlarged pores, wrinkles, and stretch marks.
